about: What it is: A professional flat iron providing one-stroke, high-definition results that last up to 24 hours...Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.- Shine.- Straightening and Smoothing..Key Benefits:.- Optimal styling temperature at 365°F.- Ultra-fast, personalized styling.- Less frizz, more shine..What Else You Need to Know:.Our high-performance ceramic floating plates are coated with an ultra-gloss finish, resulting in up to 85% more shine..ghd chronos features a re-engineered wishbone hinge to meticulously keep the plates perfectly aligned, giving you more control...Research Results:.- HD Motion-Responsive Styler: 2x more responsive for ultra-fast personalized styling, continuously adapts to your styling movements, adjusting the power for unparalleled heat monitoring accuracy at the optimum styling temperature of 365°F, indicated by the sensor light..- One stroke high-definition results that last 24 hours**: For instant and superior styles..- HD Results: 85% more shine, 2x less frizz**** and up to 3X more breakage protection***.- High-performance ceramic floating plates: coated with ultra-gloss for frizz-free, easy-glide styling.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Dry styling: .-Spritz ghd Bodyguard Heat Protect Spray over hair (sold separately)..-Part hair into one-inch-wide sections..-For a sleek, straight look: Place styler at the root and glide down the section. Use a brush for added tension and smoothness..-For a wavy or curly look: Place Styler at the root, rotate 180 degrees, and glide down the section. .-Repeat through hair...For wet to dry styling: .-Start with the ghd Helios hair dryer (sold separately). The included nozzle provides precision drying for continued styling. .-Mist over ghd Shiny Ever After shine spray (sold separately) for a smooth and sleek finish.

reviews.review_title: Just TOO HOT -- badly damaged my hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I did NOT expect to return this!! It was a joy to use--but it FRIED my hair. Made it crispy. Dull. Dead flat straight (would not hold a curve or curl). Within just days of use, my hair was markedly damaged. It even smelled toasty (not in a good way) when I got it wet. I read the reviews... read the GHD info about their 'perfect' set temperature... let myself trust that a mere 5 degrees over my usual temperature wouldn't be significant--but whooboy, it WAS. My hair is not baby-fine (though not thick and wiry, either), nor is it especially fragile. But this thing was just TOO HOT. If I could have noodged it down in temperature, I'd surely be using it still, happily. Instead, to my surprise, after a spell of using it and cluing in it was making my hair worse and worse... I initiated a return. You know your hair. If you usually style with good results at a temperature lower than ghd's so-called perfect 365... then this is not the iron for you, no matter what their research says. On the other hand, if that set temperature is what usually works for your hair, then I can say it's a marvellous design, very comfortable, sleek, elegantly and intelligently designed. The lightening-fast heat up is a joy. It's a real shame they don't allow at least a small range of temperature control. For me it was truly a disaster.

reviews.review_title: Great flat iron - advanced, compact & easy to use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a very old flat iron that I use from many years ago & it was time for a new one. Grateful that I was able to test this item out! I have very wavy hair & it drives me crazy. I often straighten my hair, so that it appears more organized. After testing the GHD flat iron, I was amazed at how advanced it is. It was so easy to use - you just plug it in & turn on the power button + in 20 seconds it is fully heated so you can use it. It is very time saving! My old flat iron takes a few minutes to turn hot. The GHD flat iron is also very compact (can take it on vacation), light (not heavy at all), and easy to use. I also like that there is an automatic sleep mode option (after 10 min of non-use). After testing this flat iron, my hair definitely was straightened faster & it did not burn my hair at all (and also did not have any burnt smell). I also like that they give you a cover to protect your flat iron. Great product so far! I have only used it to straighten my hair so I am unable to comment on curling.
